title: Weight vs Height Scatterplots Based on Gender
question_text: Examine the scatterplot below. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved. Which of the following statements is/are true? I. Combining the female and male data results in a stronger correlation than inspecting their correlations separately. II. When inspecting males and females separately, females have a weaker correlation. III. Since gender is categorical, this image represents a misuse of scatterplots.
